name: Templar
description: Oathkeepers who embody the purest ideals of light and righteousness, becoming divine champions against darkness and beacons of hope in a world threatened by evil.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Divine energy that powers holy spells and abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per 6 seconds, +5 when smiting evil creatures
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast divine spells and channel holy power
Some abilities require maintaining a divine connection, consuming mana over time
Prayer increases mana regeneration rate by 500% but requires remaining stationary
Can channel mana into weapons and armor for powerful divine enchantments
Presence in holy places doubles mana regeneration rate

resource_systems.name: Divine Favor
resource_systems.description: Blessing from the divine that empowers righteous actions
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per hour, additional points gained through upholding oaths and defeating evil
mechanics: Divine Favor can be spent to enhance weapon attacks with holy power
Can be used to empower healing spells or protective auras
Acts as a resource for powerful oath abilities
Violations of paladin code can result in temporary loss of Divine Favor
Can be shared with allies to grant them temporary divine blessings
Defeating powerful evil entities grants significant Divine Favor

resource_systems.name: Oath Power
resource_systems.description: Manifestation of a Templar's unwavering commitment to their sacred vows
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when acting in accordance with oath tenets, decreases when violating them
mechanics: Increases by 15 when performing actions that exemplify oath tenets
Decreases by 20 when acting against oath tenets
At maximum Oath Power, enter an exalted state with enhanced abilities
Can be spent to invoke powerful oath-specific abilities
Templars generate additional Oath Power when protecting innocents or defeating evil

resource_systems.name: Holy Light
resource_systems.description: Pure divine radiance that emanates from the Templar's unwavering faith
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when vanquishing evil or protecting the innocent
mechanics: Increases by 10 when defeating an evil creature
Increases by 20 when saving an innocent life
Decreases by 5 per hour when not actively combating evil
Can be spent to enhance healing abilities or create powerful holy effects
At maximum Holy Light, the Templar's presence causes pain to evil creatures

class_mechanics.name: Divine Judgment
class_mechanics.description: Channel the full power of divine justice through devastating weapon strikes
effects: Divine Smite damage increased by 100% and always critically hits evil creatures
Smite damage is quadrupled against undead, fiends, and corrupted beings
Successful smites banish lesser evil entities and stun powerful ones for 5 seconds
Each successful smite generates massive threat and marks the target for divine retribution
Holy light erupts from smite impacts, damaging nearby evil creatures

class_mechanics.name: Sanctifying Touch
class_mechanics.description: Channel pure divine healing that restores body, mind, and soul
effects: Healing power increased by 100% compared to Oathkeeper
Touch can completely cleanse corruption, curses, and possession
Can resurrect recently deceased allies with no penalty
Healing creates a temporary divine shield around the target
Can purify corrupted land and objects with sustained contact

class_mechanics.name: Aura of Sanctity
class_mechanics.description: Project a powerful aura of divine protection and inspiration
effects: Allies within aura gain 30% damage reduction and immunity to fear
Healing received by allies within aura is increased by 50%
Evil creatures within aura suffer continuous holy damage
Aura dispels illusions and reveals invisible creatures
Can maintain three different auras simultaneously

class_mechanics.name: Avatar of Light
class_mechanics.description: Transform into a radiant avatar of divine power, embodying the purest aspects of holy light
effects: Physical form becomes infused with divine light
All abilities cost 50% less resources and are 50% more effective
Presence causes evil creatures to flee in terror
Flight ability with glowing wings of light
Immune to all negative effects and corruption

signature_abilities.name: Divine Intervention
signature_abilities.description: Call upon the highest powers to intervene directly in mortal affairs
mechanics: Can completely negate any single catastrophic event or attack
Resurrect all fallen allies within 100 meters with full health
Banish all evil entities within 50 meters back to their native planes
Create a zone of absolute sanctuary where no harm can occur for 1 minute
Costs 100 Mana, 10 Divine Favor, and 100 Holy Light

signature_abilities.name: Crusader's Charge
signature_abilities.description: Lead a devastating holy charge that inspires allies and decimates enemies
mechanics: Charge forward up to 50 meters, passing through obstacles
Deal 500% weapon damage to all enemies in path
Allies who follow your charge gain 100% damage and movement speed for 30 seconds
Create a path of consecrated ground that damages evil creatures and heals allies
Costs 50 Mana, 5 Divine Favor, and 50 Oath Power

signature_abilities.name: Beacon of Hope
signature_abilities.description: Become a literal beacon of divine light that restores, protects, and inspires
mechanics: Transform into a pillar of pure holy light for 1 minute
Continuously heal all allies within 100 meters for 5% of their maximum health per second
Grant all allies within range immunity to fear, charm, and corruption
Evil creatures within range are blinded and take massive holy damage
Can be seen from vast distances, serving as a rally point for allies
Costs 75 Mana, 7 Divine Favor, and 75 Holy Light

skill_trees.name: Path of the Crusader
key_abilities: Holy War: Lead allies in battle with divine inspiration, granting them enhanced abilities
Righteous Fury: Enter a state of divine wrath that greatly enhances combat abilities
Banner of Light: Plant a divine standard that creates a powerful aura of protection and inspiration

skill_trees.name: Path of the Exorcist
key_abilities: Exorcism: Completely remove demonic possession or corruption from a target
Holy Ground: Consecrate an area, making it inhospitable to evil creatures
Divine Prison: Create a holy barrier that can trap even the most powerful evil entities

skill_trees.name: Path of the Saint
key_abilities: Miracle: Perform a true divine miracle that defies the laws of nature
Martyrdom: Take on the wounds and afflictions of others, healing them completely
Divine Shield: Create an impenetrable barrier of holy light around an ally

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Greater Oath of Devotion skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Good alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Save an innocent soul from corruption
Defeat a powerful evil entity without assistance

legendary_items.name: Sword of Divine Wrath
effects: Divine Judgment damage increased by 50%
Each successful smite has a 25% chance to instantly smite another nearby evil creature
Weapon glows with holy light, revealing hidden evil within 50 meters

legendary_items.name: Armor of the Divine Champion
effects: Reduces all damage taken by 30%
Automatically reflects 50% of holy damage back to attackers
Avatar of Light transformation duration increased by 1 minute

legendary_items.name: Halo of Sanctification
effects: Charisma increased by 5
Aura of Sanctity radius increased by 20 meters
Divine Intervention cooldown reduced by 1 day

lore: Templars represent the pinnacle of righteous devotion among Oathkeepers, embodying the purest ideals of light and justice in a world often threatened by darkness. These holy champions have transcended the ordinary bounds of divine connection, becoming living conduits for celestial power. Their unwavering faith and dedication to protecting the innocent has been rewarded with extraordinary abilities that make them formidable opponents against evil in all its forms. Templars often serve as the vanguard against major demonic incursions, undead plagues, or other catastrophic evil threats, their mere presence enough to turn the tide in such conflicts. Beyond the battlefield, they act as spiritual leaders, their wisdom and compassion guiding communities through times of hardship and uncertainty. Many establish holy orders dedicated to specific causes, training the next generation of paladins and defending sacred sites. The path of the Templar is one of constant vigilance and sacrifice, but those who walk it find fulfillment in being the light that shines brightest in the darkest places, bringing hope where despair once reigned.
